kb3.name: kb3_ship_classes
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_ship_classes` ( `scl_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `scl_class` char(32) NOT NULL, `scl_value` bigint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `scl_points` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`scl_id`), UNIQUE KEY `scl_class` (`scl_class`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=52 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
